constantValues: A record of a request for diagnostic investigations, treatments, or operations to be performed.

members.name: asNeededBoolean

constantValues: Code for the timing schedule (or just text in code.text). Some codes such as BID are ubiquitous, but many institutions define their own additional codes.

members.description: Code for the timing schedule (or just text in code.text). Some codes such as BID are ubiquitous, but many institutions define their own additional codes.

constantValues: If a CodeableConcept is present, it indicates the pre-condition for performing the procedure. For example "pain", "on flare-up", etc.

members.name: authoredOn

constantValues: When the request transitioned to being actionable.
